plot outline: The story begins with Jagga (Aman) who is an orphan and he is given asylum by Rangappa (Rangayana) who runs a tea shop in the roadside. Jagga grows up the rough way and his wayward habit gets him to alcohol at the age of 12. However, he is a good person at heart.
title: Dildara
plot: The story begins with Jagga (Aman) who is an orphan and he is given asylum by Rangappa (Rangayana) who runs a tea shop in the roadside. Jagga grows up the rough way and his wayward habit gets him to alcohol at the age of 12. However, he is a good person at heart.
